#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int mod = 1e9+7;
int main(void)
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long t,T,n,i,x;
	cin >> T;
	for(t = 1; t <= T; ++t)
	{
		cin >> n;
		long ans = 0;
		if(n ==0 or n==1 or n == 2)
			cout << "1" << endl;		
		else
		{
			ans = (log(2*M_PI*n)/2 + n*(log(n)-1))/log(10)+1;
			cout << ans << endl;
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
